options.optionText: How are you holding up in here? I’m sorry about this.
options.responseText: Oh, don’t sweat it, hero. I’m just peachy, enjoying the finest in wholesome 1950s propaganda and Hugh Jass staring at my tits. What’s not to love about being locked in a room with a masturbation maestro? All thanks to you.

followUpOptions.optionText: Look, you pushed it too far. You knew the vault's rules.
followUpOptions.responseText: Rules? Please. I was just stretching my legs… and maybe my shirt happened to stretch a little too. But hey, thanks for the betrayal. I really needed this quality time to reflect on my *wicked ways.*

followUpOptions.optionText: Come on, it’s not like you’re in here forever.
followUpOptions.responseText: Forever? Honey, in this place, five minutes feels like forever. And you know how I get when I'm bored... or horny.

followUpOptions.optionText: You know, I actually enjoy seeing you in here. Serves you right for breaking the rules.
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, I bet you do. Getting your kicks from watching someone suffer in the Shame Chamber? That’s some real sick mentality right there.
